text:
Hi Team ,
I have purchased a new theme and need to redesign the current website. I also have a sandbox account set up. Please guide me on how to configure the global settings of the new theme without affecting the live site. Once the changes are made, we need to send them for client approval. It is essential to redesign all pages with the new theme before making the site live.

I highly recommend using content staging to stage all of your new pages with the new theme.

As long as you don't set the new theme as the default in the brand kit, your web users will continue to see their default theme if they create new pages.

It has no impact whatsoever on the existing pages and nothing swaps over automatically.
